titleStmt.title: SII 12.237: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 237. (A.R. No. 221 of 1930-31). MĀNĀMADI, CHINGLEPUT TALUK AND DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE TIRUKKARĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of the 31st year registers a gift of cattle for maintaining a twilight lamp in the temple of Tirukkarapuramuḍaiya-Nāyaṉār at Vāṉavaṉmādēvi-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, by Śivadāsaṉ Ishabavāgaṉadēvaṉ (Ṛishabhavāhanadēvaṉ) Tiruvēgambamuḍaiyāṉ, the accountant of the village and his brother Āḷavanda-Piḷḷai. The dēvakaṉmis of the temple took charge of the cows and agreed to maintain the lamp.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperu
ñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 3 10 1vatu vāṉavaṉmātevicaturvedi ma
ṅkalattu Uṭaiyār tirukkarapuramuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku Ivvūr kaṇa
kkuāḷuṅ karaṇattāṉ vāṉavaṉmātevi Uṭaiyāṉ civatācaṉ Iṣa
pa vākaṉatevaṉ tiruvekampamuṭaiyāṉum Ivaṉ tampi Āḷavanta piḷ
ḷaiyum vaitta cantiviḷakku Oṉṟukku Ikkoyil tevarkaṉmika
ḷom kaikkoṇṭa pāṟpacu Iraṇṭum nāku Oṉṟu ce Oṉṟu Āka Uru nā
lukku cantirātittavarai Iṭakkaṭavom Ippaṭikku Ikkoyil
Āḻvāṉ paṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai Āḷuṭaiyāṉpaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 12.237 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
